channel.title: CVE Feed for UnitedThemes -- Shortcodes by United Themes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for UnitedThemes -- Shortcodes by United Themes

item.title: CVE-2024-37097|2024-08-02T03:50:54.680Z -- unitedthemes -- shortcodes%20by%20united%20themes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in UnitedThemes Shortcodes by United Themes allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Shortcodes by United Themes: from n/a before 5.0.5.
